mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.gprs_id,t1.target,t1.bin_file_path,t1.firmware,t1.version,t1.slave_indexes FROM ota_send t1 JOIN rcv_gprs_list t2 on t1.gprs_id=t2.gprs_id WHERE t2.link_status=1 AND send_done=0 LIMIT #{number};
mapper.update: UPDATE ota_send SET result_info=#{result_info} , send_done=#{state} where id=#{id};
UPDATE rcv_gprs_list SET link_status=0 where port=#{port};
UPDATE ota_send SET send_done=7, result_info='升级过程重启程序' WHERE send_done=1;
INSERT INTO rcv_gprs_list (gprs_id,link_status,port) value(#{gprs_id},#{link_status},#{port}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE link_status=#{link_status} , update_time=default , port=#{port};
